function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Local adaptive capacity may not be sufficient to contain the spread of contagious diseases in diverse contexts.","Impact":"Increased risk of uncontrolled disease propagation and outbreaks in different communities.","Mitigation":"Developing flexible and adaptable intervention strategies to address specific local challenges, while ensuring their applicability across diverse contexts.","Technologies":"Modelling and simulation tools for predicting disease spread in different environments.","People":"Local communities in diverse contexts.","Owner":"Global public health organizations and local community leaders."},{"Description":"Limited attempts to scale up local approaches for disease containment.","Impact":"Difficulty in implementing effective disease control measures on a global scale.","Mitigation":"Investing in research and development of scalable intervention strategies for disease containment.","Technologies":"Digital platforms for sharing best practices and lessons learned in disease containment.","People":"Global public health actors and local community leaders.","Owner":"International health organizations and research institutions."},{"Description":"Inadequate link between research, policy, and action in real-time.","Impact":"Delay in implementing evidence-based interventions and translating research findings into practice.","Mitigation":"Establishing real-time communication channels between researchers, policymakers, and community leaders to facilitate rapid translation of research into action.","Technologies":"Real-time data analytics and communication platforms for research-to-policy translation.","People":"Researchers, policymakers, and community leaders.","Owner":"Research institutions, governmental health agencies, and international organizations."}]}
